'''"Special Analysis Zoom Lens"''' is a [[gadget]] obtained from the {{Quest|The Long-Failed "Graph Adversarial Technology"...}}

The Zoom Lens can be activated in the [[Inventory]], or equipped in Quick Use slot, to allow zooming while using an equipped [[Kamera]]. When equipped as [[Charlotte]] and holding her [[Elemental Skill]], the Zoom Lens allows the Kamera to be used while moving, in [[Combat]], and in [[Domain]]s, due to her [[Utility Passive]], [[First-Person Shutter]].
